      void AbstractIKPin.alignToAxes​(AbstractAxes inAxes)
      translates and rotates the pin to match the position and orientation of the input Axes.
      void AbstractKusudama.checkIfInInvertedLimit​(AbstractAxes boneAxes, AbstractAxes startParentBoneAxes, AbstractAxes newParentBoneAxes, AbstractAxes simulatedLimitingAxes)
      given a set of Axes representing the localAxes of the bone to which this kusudama is attached @param boneAxes, and a set of Axes representing the localAxes of that bone's parent @param startParentBoneAxes, determines if setting the parentBoneAxes to @param newParentBoneAxes would result in a violation of the constraint on this bone.
      Rot AbstractArmature.getRotationBetween​(AbstractAxes a, AbstractAxes b)
      returns the rotation that would bring the right-handed orthonormal axes of a into alignment with b

      SGVec_3d AbstractKusudama.pointInLimits​(SGVec_3d inPoint, double[] inBounds, AbstractAxes limitingAxes)
      Given a point (in global coordinates), checks to see if a ray can be extended from the KusudamaExample's origin to that point, such that the ray in the KusudamaExample's reference frame is within the range allowed by the KusudamaExample's coneLimits.
      SGVec_3d AbstractKusudama.pointInSoftBound​(SGVec_3d currentPosition_global, SGVec_3d targetPosition_global, AbstractAxes limitingAxes)
      Given a point representing the tip of this bone in local coordinates prior to rotation and a point representing the tip of this bone in local coordinates after rotation returns the point where it would be after penalizing the portion of the rotation moving toward the nearest boundary.

      Presumes the input axes are the bone's localAxes, and rotates them to satisfy the snap limits.
      void AbstractBone.setAxesToSnapped​(AbstractAxes toSet, AbstractAxes limitingAxes)
      same as snapToConstraints, but operates on user supplied axes meant to correspond to the bone's localAxes and majorRotationAxes you are unlikely to need to use this, and at the moment it presumes KusudamaExample constraints
